description: Mary Lou McDonald responds to Drew Harris' comments on the IRA's relationship with Sinn F¨¦in.
title: Mary Lou McDonald: Sinn F¨¦in leader says IRA no longer exists
title_page: Mary Lou McDonald: Sinn F¨¦in leader says IRA no longer exists - BBC News
maintext: Asked about the relationship between Sinn F¨¦in and the Provisional IRA at a graduation ceremony for new garda recruits, Commissioner Harris said: "I am aware of the PSNI and the British security services assessment and we do not differ from that view."
